about_the_game:
You're every inch the stereotype of a starving artist: empty ramen cups in stacks on your desk, a month behind on rent, and a rapidly dwindling hope that you're actually going to get anywhere in your life. That is, until you receive an email from a religious sect, requesting a commission for their order.

Desperate for both validation and money, you agree, but quickly find yourself lost within their god-seeking ritual. With imposter's syndrome, trauma, and bloodthirsty angels breathing down your neck, you have to decide: is your life being worth the world really a good thing?

Escape both ethereal horrors and otherworldly confreres as you race against time, solving puzzles before whatever resides here decides that it wants your body as a vessel. Alla Prima is packed to the brim with gameplay and storytelling reminiscent of classic RPG Maker Horror games, including chase scenes, environmental puzzles, and exploration of the mysterious environment before you.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, offscreen violence, and referenced death of characters.

name: Alla Prima

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels desktop resolution
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: A starving artist desperate for money and validation joins a religious cult, unaware of the god-seeking ritual she's diving head first into. Explore your environment, solve puzzles and uncover your past to make sense of yourself and the reality unfolding in front of you.
